entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h this morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
